options.title: Creator
options.subtitle: Has access to automate templates and share it. Can set up approval/negotiation workflows and send documents.

options.title: Collaborator
options.subtitle: Can use automated templates made by creators, set up approval/negotiation workflows and send documents.

options.title: Observer
options.subtitle: Can see all documents, approval and negoatiation workflows to which he has been invited but cannot intervene on the documents, only add comments.
